articles.content: Property News: The couple building during COVID-19 restrictions - domain.com.au

articles.author: Alex Druce, Lucy Battersby
articles.title: ASX up 1%; Nearmap bounces back; Crown CEO Barton gone - The Age
articles.description: Australian shares jumped as much as 1% on Monday as the market rebounded from Friday’s dip. The major miners, tech firms, and the banks were performing well.
articles.content: News that the first 142,000 doses of the Pfizer/BioNTech COVID-19 vaccine had arrived in Australia also boosted local sentiment, but investors said it was a sterling earnings season performance from … [+2226 chars]
